mapper.sql: bookId, bookName, shortName, pinYin, publisher, version, theYear, coverImage, cipImage, subjectId, gradeId, createDate, volume, elective
mapper.insert: insert into bok_book_info (bookName, shortName, pinYin, publisher, version, theYear, coverImage, cipImage, subjectId, gradeId, createDate, volume, elective) values (#{bookName}, #{shortName}, #{pinYin}, #{publisher}, #{version}, #{theYear}, #{coverImage}, #{cipImage}, #{subjectId}, #{gradeId}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), #{volume}, #{elective})

insert.foreach: insert into bok_book_info (bookName, shortName, pinYin, publisher, version, theYear, coverImage, cipImage, subjectId, gradeId, createDate, volume, elective) values (#{item.bookName}, #{item.shortName}, #{item.pinYin}, #{item.publisher}, #{item.version}, #{item.theYear}, #{item.coverImage}, #{item.cipImage}, #{item.subjectId}, #{item.gradeId}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), #{item.volume}, #{item.elective})
